verbose_text: To get an estimate of regression coefficients beta ^ =(beta ^ 1,..., beta ^ p), we look at the square loss function (1/2) | | y-Xbeta ^ | | 22 and the l1-norm regularization | | beta ^ | | 1, which leads to the LASSO optimization problem (Equation 2) minbeta ^ inRp12 | | y-Xbeta ^ | | 22+ lambda | | beta ^ | | 1, where the tuning parameter lambda> = 0.
